评论详情: The dress is cute, but I’m not super impressed. The design with the twirly skirt is adorable, but the quality just isn’t great. The fabric feels a bit cheap… especially the tulle, which is thinner than expected. The cotton bodice is soft, but it doesn’t seem very durable.  It’s fine for a special occasion or a quick photo. The dress looks great, but I’m not sure how well it will hold up after a few washes or active play. Overall, it’s just okay, but definitely not the best value for the price.
